Outcome of the event
fields.options:
No error - Events simply have potential to cause error.
Error but No Harm - Error did not reach patient.
Error but No Harm - Error reached the patient but no harm.
Error but No Harm - Error Reached the patient, no harm but requires monitoring.
Error + harm - Temporary harm requiring treatment.
Error + harm - Temporary harm requiring hospitalization.
Error + harm - Permanent Harm.
Error + harm - Near death event.
